content: lion brand pattern # 70190a skill level beginner level 1 cotton-ease® article #830 2 colors 6 balls total a 4 balls b 2 balls *shown in lake & lime* crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge 15 half_double_crochet u s = 5 in 12 5 cm work in half_double_crochet until piece measures about 30 in 76 cm square crochet border for 3 in 7 5 cm to finish similar patterns make it yours pocket pal blanket 1 make it yours ruffled baby blanket 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/make-it-yours-pocket-pal-blanket 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/make-it-yours-ruffled-baby-blanket
